title: Devil's Bargain
description: Family members and the lead investigators who cracked the Kelsey Berreth case speak out for the first time and take Andrea Canning inside the murder investigation. Originally aired on NBC on February 7, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
